# BuildCheck rule list

> Documentation for BuildCheck rule list.

*Topics available: 3*

- [BC0101: Shared output path](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/tools/buildcheck-rules/bc0101.md): Learn about .NET SDK error BC0101, which occurs when an output path or intermediate outpath is shared between multiple projects.
- [BC0102: Double writes](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/tools/buildcheck-rules/bc0102.md): Learn about .NET SDK error BC0102, which occurs when multiple tasks attempt to write to a single file.
- [BuildCheck rule list](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/tools/buildcheck-rules/index.md): A complete list of BCxxxx build check errors.
